summary: Web app for an IPL auction/fantasy-style experience: users create their own teams, select exactly 11 members, and earn/track points based on selection rules.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cricket-themed app logo with a bat/ball silhouette in a warm sporty palette (ipl-fantasy-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Stylized cricket stadium hero illustration, clean and modern, warm sporty colors (cricket-stadium-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity login and use the authenticated principal to scope all user data so different users can create and manage their own teams independently.
Enforce the rule that each created team must have exactly 11 selected members, including clear validation errors when users try to save with fewer/more than 11 players.
Implement a points-based system for selected players and team totals, including UI to display per-player points and a computed team total points for each user team.

Build an action-based, easy step-by-step workflow UI: (1) create a team (name), (2) browse/filter/search players and select them, (3) review roster (must be 11) and confirm, (4) view/manage existing teams.

Provide a consistent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a cricket/league feel, and apply it across all pages without using a blue/purple primary palette.

Add generated static images to the frontend and use them in the UI (e.g., app logo and a hero/background illustration) by placing them under frontend/public/assets/generated and referencing them directly from the frontend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build an IPL auction/fantasy-style web app workflow (easy, action-based)
Support team creation with exactly 11 selected members per team
Implement a points-based selection/scoring system for chosen players
Add multi-user support so different users can create and manage their own teams
Create a core data model for an IPL fantasy/auction-style app: players (name, role, team/club, base cost/value, and a points value or points history), user teams, and team rosters.

projectName: IPL fantasy auction-style team builder with 11-player teams, points, and multi-user support
